elements.text:
You are looking after a friend's child and you're watching TV while they sleep. It's dark outside and you suddenly hear noises against the window. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I'm happy that my favorite show is on TV.
I'm excited to see my friend and hear about their night out.
I feel worried that something is looking into the window.
My heart is beating a little faster than it was before I heard the noise, but I know that it'll go back to normal soon.
It makes sense that I was scared at first, but remind myself that I'm probably safe.
